TopicTitle: How to add bouyancy to a part?

Articles.Content: I need to get airbags so a capsule will float in water. My Mercury capsule from FASA seems to sink underwater. I want to apply "airbags" to the FASA floats. How can I accomplish this? From what I hear the water in KSP now can accept buoyancy from parts, but I dont know how to code a part to do so.
You change the mass. Simple as that.
